name: get_response
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool automatic_custom_response_creator.
Tool description: send a customer review, you will receive a personalized response proposal automatically
API description: There are 3 params necessary : 

- First - Add a review "avis" (ex. "Merci pour votre accueil, c'était parfait")
- Then - Add a "business_type" (ex. "Restaurant")
- Finaly - Add a "business_brand" (ex. "Fuzi")

avis.description: The review text (e.g., "Merci pour votre accueil, c'était parfait").
